description:
The Gatorade shower is a celebratory tradition in which the winning head coach of the Super Bowl is doused with Gatorade or a similar liquid.

This market will resolve according to the color of the Gatorade shower at Super Bowl LX.

The Gatorade does not need to visibly land on the head coach, so long as it is clearly poured in celebration directed at them. For the purposes of this market, the liquid does not need to be branded Gatorade.

If no Gatorade shower occurs during the game or the post-game celebration, this market will resolve to “No Gatorade Shower”.

If the color of the Gatorade shower does not clearly match one of the listed options or cannot be definitively determined, this market will resolve in favor of the listed option that most closely matches the observed color.

If Super Bowl LX is cancelled or postponed after February 22, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No Gatorade Shower".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official broadcast of Super Bowl LX; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Pro Football Championship: Gatorade Shower Color

question: Will the Gatorade shower at Super Bowl LX be orange?
